typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as string,
		Likelihood as string,
		Severity as string,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as string,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as string,
		Residual_Severity as string,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as string,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as string,
		Quarterly_Incidents as string,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as integer,
		Severity as integer,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as integer,
		Residual_Severity as integer,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Quarterly_Incidents as integer,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalRiskOpportunityRegister
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents = ConvertDatesAndID@Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalRiskOpportunityRegister derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,Risk_Ops_Descripton,Actions_Controls,Date_Lodged,Likelihood,Severity,Inherent_Risk_Rating,Eliminate_Mitigate,Residual_Likelihood,Residual_Severity,Residual_Risk_Rating,Future_Controls,Person_Responsible,Date_Closed,Quarterly_Incidents,Risk_Opps_Flag)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Risk_Opp_ID = Risk_Opp_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code = Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Relation_Risk_Ops_Descripton = Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Relation_Actions_Controls = Actions_Controls,
		Relation_Date_Lodged = Date_Lodged,
		Relation_Likelihood = Likelihood,
		Relation_Severity = Severity,
		Relation_Inherent_Risk_Rating = Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Relation_Eliminate_Mitigate = Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Relation_Residual_Likelihood = Residual_Likelihood,
		Relation_Residual_Severity = Residual_Severity,
		Relation_Residual_Risk_Rating = Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Relation_Future_Controls = Future_Controls,
		Relation_Person_Responsible = Person_Responsible,
		Relation_Date_Closed = Date_Closed,
		Relation_Quarterly_Incidents = Quarterly_Incidents,
		Relation_Risk_Opps_Flag = Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndID derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,Risk_Ops_Descripton,Actions_Controls,Date_Lodged,Likelihood,Severity,Inherent_Risk_Rating,Eliminate_Mitigate,Residual_Likelihood,Residual_Severity,Residual_Risk_Rating,Future_Controls,Person_Responsible,Date_Closed,{},Risk_Opps_Flag)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Risk_Opp_ID == Relation_Risk_Opp_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingRiskOpportunityReg@NewRiskOpportunityReg select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Date_Lodged = toDate(Date_Lodged, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Date_Closed = toDate(Date_Closed, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Risk_Opp_ID = toInteger(Risk_Opp_ID),
		Likelihood = toShort(Likelihood),
		Severity = toShort(Severity),
		Inherent_Risk_Rating = toShort(Inherent_Risk_Rating),
		Residual_Likelihood = toShort(Residual_Likelihood),
		Residual_Severity = toShort(Residual_Severity),
		Residual_Risk_Rating = toShort(Residual_Risk_Rating),
		Quarterly_Incidents = toInteger(Quarterly_Incidents)) ~> ConvertDatesAndID
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingRiskOpportunityReg@(NewRiskOpportunityReg, ChangedRiskOpportunityReg, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingRiskOpportunityReg@ChangedRiskOpportunityReg derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID = Relation_Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as integer,
		Severity as integer,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as integer,
		Residual_Severity as integer,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Quarterly_Incidents as integer,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Risk_Opp_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow
